name: @hmudesign/hedra
description: A React component library for working with three.js.
author: Christopher Baker <christopher@hmudesign.com>

scripts.build: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production babel --source-maps --copy-files src --out-dir lib
scripts.dev: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=development babel --source-maps --copy-files src --out-dir lib  --watch
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:pre: npm version prerelease && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --tag=pre
